name: open-in-atom-plus

1.0.0.name: open-in-atom-plus
1.0.0.description: right click to open folders from finder in atom

readme:
# Open in Atom Plus
> Open folders from Finder in Atom

[![Installs!](https://img.shields.io/apm/dm/open-in-atom-plus.svg)](https://atom.io/packages/open-in-atom-plus)
[![Version!](https://img.shields.io/apm/v/open-in-atom-plus.svg)](https://atom.io/packages/open-in-atom-plus)
[![License](https://img.shields.io/apm/l/open-in-atom-plus.svg)](LICENSE.md)

![Example](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13633271/59151827-6a9f4780-89ff-11e9-9179-81144a3fe22b.png)

## Usage
Select a Folder from Finder > Secondary Click > Open in Atom (at the bottom possibly under Services)

![Demo](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13633271/59151621-cff13980-89fb-11e9-9980-000477684ea7.gif)

## Installation
`apm install open-in-atom-plus`

## License
